name: Galen's Lightsaber, Vader's Gift
Lore: 'Custom-built by Darth Vader. After the Clone Wars, he wielded this weapon while hunting down the last of the Jedi. Cuts through almost anything except another lightsaber blade.',
Text: 'Deploy on Galen.  Galen may add one destiny to total power or attrition.  May target a character or creature for free.  Draw two destiny.  Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.',
